attributes.title: Honest Truth
attributes.userName: Person u don't need to know
attributes.review: I am traumatized. This app asked to track my location or else I could not use it. I went to the store and when I was walking back to my car, I saw Trump standing there creepily. He refused to let me inside my car & began to shed Cheeto dust all over it. I called the police but since I was not a middle aged white woman screaming into the phone, they did not come to my rescue. Trump ran off naked, leaving a Cheeto puff trail behind him. The trauma I now carry with me is haunting and I only wish this burden on Trump himself. This app is dangerous and needs to be deleted. Iâ€™m disgusted having to put 1 star instead of 0.

attributes.title: This app gave me ptsd
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just like everyone else in the reviews. Iâ€™m not going to lie- I had high hopes for this one. AS SOON AS I opened the app, I was greeted with the most distorted and horrifying face I have ever seen. I was frozen in fear and shock, causing me to look even longer in the demonic eyes of the distorted man. Finally I mustered up the strength to shut off my phone and delete the app. Now every time I close my eyes, I see THAT FACE. Everywhere I go I am reminded of this app that has scarred me so. I even had to quit my job. This app needs deleted before it ruins anyone elseâ€™s life. I beg you: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
